title: Jungle/ADC Main Looking For A Team
body:
I'm only in bronze 2 but im a good jungler and im learning adc. im hoping to join a team of higher ranked players who are willing to teach me the more advanced side of the game and help me reach my true potential. i have skype and discord so i can talk.

if you actually consider me by some miracle then please add me in-game. who knows you might make a new friend :D

Happy Gaming,
ConnTroller
